attributes.action: Stop using schools across the UK for polling stations.
attributes.additional_details: Local MP Jeremy Quinn has expressed his support with this!
attributes.background: The council's should be using halls, churches and community centre's. 2 schools are closed within 200yards of each other it's not on!!! This needs to stop! The council's won't let us take kids away but happily close a school if it suits and benefits them!
